subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The absence of superstar Mia Hamm seems linked with the end of an era, as indicated by the tiny corps of seven American news media outlets traveling to China to cover this World Cup.
snippet: The absence of superstar Mia Hamm seems linked with the end of an era, as indicated by the tiny corps of seven American news media outlets traveling to China to cover this World Cup.
